meanings.definition: Capable of being understood or grasped.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the math problem in an apprehensible way.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written in an apprehensible manner for everyone to follow.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to speak English was not apprehensible, but it was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an apprehensible puzzle, waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel became apprehensible after watching the movie.

meanings.definition: Able to be perceived or comprehended.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was apprehensible to all who witnessed it.
meanings.sent2: The importance of the project became apprehensible after the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt to do a backflip was not apprehensible, but it sure was entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an apprehensible melody, soothing to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The vastness of the universe was suddenly apprehensible under the starry sky.
